data.text:
The restaurant staffs are very friendly and accommodating. They know how to attend to our needs especially for my two girls.

Food is good, worth the value of the money we paid.

This is our 2nd visit to their restaurant. And definitely not the last.
data.title: Great Breakfast Experience

data.text:
Excellent they are all helpful and very respectful. Anything we need they give us. And the food is good as well. The pool are is nice and there are for kids. Ambiance and is nice and there are people checking your kids from
time to time in the pool
data.title: So comfortable staff are accommodating

data.text:
Last day here ...mixed feelings. Had an amazing time in dubai and thoroughly enjoyed my holiday  would definitely come back but unfortunately not to this hotel.
I am writing this from my breakfast table where I have been waiting now for 45 minutes for a latte ...not a one off sadly, also waited 15 minutes for butter on 2 occasions by which time toast was cold ,made more toast then eggs were cold  . Breakfast is chaotic yet there seems to be plenty of staff 
This is also the case in the bar for the 4pm till 6pm complimentary drinks slow and disorganised
Sunbeds ! Well basically not enough for number of guests ...pool guys are very good and helpful this is not their fault management should provide more ...I haven't come to a supposedly 5 star hotel to sit on a beanbag or a mat 
Rooms were very clean and the cleaners do an excellent job and are helpful and friendly 
Food is good and plenty of it with a good choice if restaurants in the hotel ...the Lebanese was my favourite 
All in all a pleasant stay but would not return
data.title: Mixed feelings

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Discover 740227,

We appreciate your honest review and are sorry to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations.

We are glad to hear that you had an amazing time in Dubai and thoroughly enjoyed your holiday. We value your feedback and take your comments seriously as they help us improve and provide a better experience for our guests in the future.

We apologize for the issues you encountered during breakfast, such as delays in receiving your latte and butter, as well as the challenges with the complimentary drinks service in the bar. Your feedback regarding the lack of sunbeds and the slow service is noted, and we will address these concerns with our team to ensure a smoother and more efficient experience for our guests.

We are pleased to hear that you found the rooms very clean and that our housekeeping team did an excellent job. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to them for their hard work and dedication to maintaining a high standard of cleanliness.

It's great to hear that you enjoyed the food and the variety of restaurants available at the hotel, with the Lebanese restaurant being your favorite. We appreciate your positive feedback on the dining options and will continue to strive for excellence in this area.

We are sorry to hear that you will not return to our hotel, but we thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We appreciate your input and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City

data.text: The Hotel is excellent and stay was very comfortable. View from room was nice with river view and Burj khalifa view. Food is delicious and plenty of variety. Mr. Ahmed and Ms. Bhavna at restaurant was very helpful and taken care a lot. Mr. Man Kumar and Jatinder were very cooperative at concierge were very helpful. Overall Excellent stay at Crowne Plaza, Festival City Dubai
data.title: Excellent stay at Crowne Plaza, Festival City Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jitendrathakre,

We are thrilled to hear that you had a comfortable and enjoyable experience with us at the Crowne Plaza Dubai Festival City.

We are delighted that you enjoyed the nice views from your room, overlooking the river and with a view of the iconic Burj Khalifa. It's great to hear that you found the food delicious and appreciated the variety of options available. We are committed to providing a memorable dining experience for all our guests.

We are pleased to hear that Mr. Ahmed, Ms. Bhavna, Mr. Man Kumar, and Jatinder provided you with helpful and attentive service during your stay. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to them and the rest of our team. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad that our staff members were able to enhance your experience with their excellent service.

We are grateful for your positive feedback and for choosing Crowne Plaza Festival City Dubai for your stay. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we are delighted to hear that you had an overall excellent experience with us. Thank you for your support, and we can't wait to host you again and continue to exceed your expectations.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City

data.text:
I spent 50 nights at the Crowne Plaza on various business trips during 2023.
Service is always excellent. Convenient for mall and walk along creek.
Breakfast has a wide selection on offer.
Often had dinner rates for an extra dirham per day at the Intercontinental buffet.
Pool was undergoing maintenance but staff helpful in finding good location in shade.
data.title: Great service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear JimCoghill,

We are delighted to hear that you spent a significant amount of time with us and that you found the service consistently excellent.

We are glad you found our hotel convenient for accessing the mall and enjoying a walk along the creek. We also appreciate your feedback about the dinner rates at the Intercontinental buffet and are pleased that you found it to be a good value for an extra dirham per day. We strive to offer our guests enticing dining options that enhance their overall experience.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the pool undergoing maintenance during your stay. However, we are glad to hear that our staff helped assist you in finding a good location in the shade. Our team is dedicated to ensuring that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable stay, and we are pleased that they were able to accommodate your needs.

Thank you for choosing the Crowne Plaza Dubai Festival City for your business trips and for taking the time to share your experiences. Your feedback is valuable to us as we continuously strive to provide exceptional service and amenities for our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back for future stays.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City
